name: Ziggy Bungus and the Untested Will of a Pizza Delivery Man in Extreme Debt
name_original: Ziggy Bungus and the Untested Will of a Pizza Delivery Man in Extreme Debt
description:
You are in debt. Gotta deliver pizzas on a unicycle, company policy.

Made by cyman and Yecats with additional level design by Nick Harrison.

Some sounds are from freesound.org

Controls: arrow keys or WASD to move

space or x to jump
